content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate factory at position(z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure that all required ingredients for crafting are available in the inventory or accessible from the appropriate structures (e.g., furnaces or assembling machines).

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory management
- Regularly check the inventory to ensure required items are available before attempting to craft or extract.
